column4: Hi, need help, I cant switch between users anymore. When clicking Quit->Switch User, what appears is a just a password-prompt for <this> user, instead of a new userlogin which is what is excepted.
try to type exit and then the other user name
I can logout and login to another. But i donw want to logout, but rather temporary switch to another user
those are... work areas like other desktops
